XMLlist:
Table with the available parameters for the import_basic function (Description -> Default value) Import function to use -> func_bdp.inc.php ISBN mandatory ? -> No Record linkage on ISBN ? -> Yes Only ISBN ? -> No (Ignore the ISSN) Status of the imported records -> Value of the user parameter "Default record status when integrating records" Generate links between records ? -> No Take authority records into account ? -> No Default origin of the authorities if not precised in the records ? -> empty Copy owner -> Default value for the user parameter "Default owner when creating a new copy" Copy status -> Value for the user parameter "Default document status when creating a new copy" Copy location -> Value for the user parameter "Default document location when creating a new copy" Call number of the copy mandatory ? -> No Types of code document of the owner -> No (Generic code) Statistical code of the code of the owner ? -> No (Generic code) Code sections of the owner ? -> No (Generic code)

Table with unimarc records to import States if yes or no the copies have to be managed No error noticed No record to process Number of records already in the base Number of rejected records Total number of records Messages that should be displayed on screen during the import Renseigné si aucune notice n'a été passée à la fonction or if there was no error message during the import (see hereunder) Table of tables of the errors noticed during the import: Array([X] => Array([error_origin] => Origin of the error, [error_text] => Error message, [nb_error] => Number of times the error happened))
